name: Venni Caprice God Bless America Box Top - One Size Fits Most
description:
Designer:
Venni Caprice
Made with love (and a serger) by me!

Details:
Lightweight and mildly sheer poly knit with cotton "God Bless America" heart sewn on the front
Flutter sleeves
Navy rolled edge hem
Mildly cropped length
Tank top is NOT included
Wide boat neckline
Matching headband comes with it!! (not pictured)

name: Off Shoulder Cropped 4th of July Shirt - One size fits most
description:
Details:
Mildly sheer white lacey fabric with navy nautical stripes and an american flag/star applique
White rolled edge hem
Cropped length
Tank top is NOT included
Wide neckline
This entire shirt is 100% handmade

name: Venni Caprice 4th of July Dress - Made to Order
description: If you want this item overnighted, it is $22 for inside the US. XS/S or M/L - let me know if note to seller which you would like! Thanks! Designer: Venni Caprice Made with love (and a serger) by me! Details: Cobalt blue nylon tricot stretch knit dress, with cotton flat bust in front Elastic top gives the very top rolled edge hem a nice ruffle babydoll empire waist mid thigh length silky fabric rolled edge hem on all edge elastic empire waist strapless Choose the size from the size chart that closest matches your bust measurement, the rest will line up. Length is about 26-27 from top to bottom (Go to this size chart and choose which size fits your own measurementsclosest: SIZE CHART)

name: Venni Caprice Independence Day Elastic belt - Made to order
description: Please give me your waist measurement and I will make it in your size! (If you would like to order from size chart, go to the chart and choose which size fits your own waist closest. Since it is super stretchy elastic it will fit even if you choose a size NEAR your waist measurement. Removable American flag bow on top of a nautical striped elastic belt with a silver metal hook closure at back. 2 inches wide elastic belt (Go to this size chart and choose which size fits your own measurements closest: SIZE CHART)

name: Venni Caprice Solid Black Corset Wide Belt
description: Please give me your waist measurement and I will make it in your size! (Go to this size chart and choose which size fits your own waist closest: SIZE CHART) 4" Wide black elastic belt that is just solid black in the back, with corset d-ring velvet trim to close with a black ribbon in the front, in the back, or even wear it over the bust to spice up a plain dress! Only available in black!
